title: "Healthcare CRM Market to Surpass USD 31.54 billion by 2028 owing to Key Technological Breakthroughs | Brandessence Market Research"
excerpt: "The Healthcare CRM Market is anticipated to reach a valuation of USD 31.54 Billion by 2028 from USD 12.53 Billion in 2021, registering a CAGR of 14.1% over the forecast duration of 2022-2028. The healthcare industry is anticipated to experience a surge in the demand for Customer Relationship Management (CRM) solutions due to the growing requirement for structured data and automation within healthcare organizations."
